name: Pear Pearish
description:
Like any astronaut, your exploring a tea cup, corn field, house tiles, carpet, place to collect triangles, but an evil pirate wants to ruin your day! The pirate, as all pirates do, is trying to annoy you for the fun of it and make you fail your mission by throwing pears at you.

In this arcade style game, you have to collect as many triangles as you can before loosing all your lives to get a high high score. There are four types of collectables, and these are:

- Triangles: They appear in the main stage and are worth 50 points.

- Special Collectables: They appear in the special stage and are worth 100 points each.

- Rare Collectable: It appears in the center of the main stage after surviving for a certain amount of time without leaving the main stage and is worth 1000 points.

- Secret Collectable:  It appears in *** ****** ***** and is worth 336 point.

There are also three stages, the main stage and the special stage can be seen in screenshots here on the game's download page.

The game doesn't have much, but it is quite fun and I hope you'll enjoy it!
